document_data.mainbody:
Irgul of Telflamm was an adventurer of some renown who met his demise circa 1370 DR in the town of Jathrins Jump in Turmish.
A tomb complex underneath Jathrins Jump, often used by smugglers, attracted the attention of fortune-seeking adventurers. Sometime shortly before the , Irgul and his band found a way into the tombs. As they reached the tombs main chamber, Irgul was torn apart by a stone golem. His fellow adventurers survived the expedition.
